message: Let's start fair. I propose a 90/10 split in my favor.  We can negotiate further if you'd like.
Alice, your starting offer was a bit steep.  I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Let's be realistic - time is money and it's losing value fast.
Okay, let's meet in the middle. 60/40 is more reasonable.  We both need to act quickly before the value of the money drops further.
Alice, we're running out of time.  55/45 is my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
